examples: With this account, you can withdraw up to £300 a day.
Con esta cuenta, puede retirar hasta £ 300 por día.
He had withdrawn all the money from their joint account.
Había retirado todo el dinero de su cuenta conjunta.
Government troops were forced to withdraw.
Las tropas gubernamentales se vieron obligadas a retirarse.
Both powers withdrew their forces from the region.
Ambas potencias retiraron sus fuerzas de la región.
